abstract: Maybe we spoke too soon about the comparatively nice manners of Anderson Cooper, the 10 p.m. anchor on CNN, and Greta Van Susteren, his counterpart at Fox News Channel, toward each other.
snippet: Maybe we spoke too soon about the comparatively nice manners of Anderson Cooper, the 10 p.m. anchor on CNN, and Greta Van Susteren, his counterpart at Fox News Channel, toward each other.
lead_paragraph: Maybe we spoke too soon about the comparatively nice manners of Anderson Cooper, the 10 p.m. anchor on CNN, and Greta Van Susteren, his counterpart at Fox News Channel, toward each other.

headline.main: We Take It Back: Greta and Anderson Don’t Play Nicely Together
